Package cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard

Interface Summary
IDatabaseStoreable Interface implemented by classes that can be stored in the database.
IPropertyBased Interface implemented by classes that can use properties for storing configuration.
 

Class Summary
AboutForm About dialog.
ADatabaseManager Interface implemented by database managers.
LoginForm Login form
LoginManagerDialog Login Manager Dialog.
LoginWorkerDialog Worker login dialog
ManagerForm Manager login form
QueryParameter Data holding the type and value of a SQL query parameter.
Shift Represents a shift worked by a worker.
ShiftManager Database backend manager for handling Shift class.
ShiftsForm For for viewing shifts.
Supervisor Represents worker's supervisor in the ClockCard system.
Worker Class that represents worker who is using the ClockCard system.
WorkerForm Worker's control form.
WorkerManager Database backend manager for handling Worker class.
 

Exception Summary
ShiftException Exception being raised when illegal operation is ran on Shift object.
